definition: state official or subject in dynastic China/I, your servant (used in addressing the sovereign)/Kangxi radical 131
to divine/to forecast or estimate/(of a place to live etc) to choose
to hide (as an undercover agent)/an insider (in a gang of thieves)/a mole
hard sleeper (a type of sleeper train ticket class with a harder bunk)
lit. to sleep on brushwood and taste gall (like King Gou Jian of Yue 勾踐|勾践[Gou1 Jian4]), in order to recall one's humiliations) (idiom)/fig. to maintain one's resolve for revenge
lit. to lie on firewood and taste gall (idiom); fig. suffering patiently, but firmly resolved on revenge
lit. to sleep on brushwood and taste gall (like King Gou Jian of Yue 勾踐|勾践[Gou1 Jian4]), in order to recall one's humiliations) (idiom)/fig. to maintain one's resolve for revenge
lit. to lie on firewood and taste gall (idiom); fig. suffering patiently, but firmly resolved on revenge
soft sleeper (a type of sleeper train ticket class with a softer bunk)
to lie down/to drop to the ground

sentences.english: In a clear stream lies an untouched bright pearl.
sentences.chinese: 一颗纯洁璀璨的明珠就卧在清澈溪底。

sentences.english: A verdurous snake wreathing in a puddle of unknown green liquid above the ground.
sentences.chinese: 一条碧绿的蛇盘卧在地面上一滩绿色的不明液体中。

sentences.english: In this case, the change to semi-sitting position and relevant medication helped reestablish her ventilation and save her life.
sentences.chinese: 在此病例中，半坐卧姿势及药物重建了其呼吸道通气。

sentences.english: Correct sleeping position should be to the right side, the legs slightly bent.
sentences.chinese: 正确的睡觉姿势应该是向右侧卧，双腿微曲。

sentences.english: Bench presses are one exercise that can increase chest muscles.
sentences.chinese: 卧推练习能增强胸部肌肉。

sentences.english: This bear had been fishing in the river on this morning. It climbed onto the bank and laid down in the grass.
sentences.chinese: 在河里捕了一早的鱼，棕熊爬到岸边卧在草地上。

sentences.english: A pelican sits covered with oil in Barataria Bay, Louisiana
sentences.chinese: 巴拉塔里亚湾，一只裹满石油的褐鹈鹕卧在水里。

sentences.english: Both mothers were lying on their backs with their paws in the air.
sentences.chinese: 两个母狮都仰面而卧挥舞着狮爪。

sentences.english: Issachar is a strong ass couching down between two burdens
sentences.chinese: 以萨迦是个强壮的驴，卧在羊圈之中。

sentences.english: When you lie down, use the auspicious posture, lying on your right side with your body curved in the shape of a bow.
sentences.chinese: 卧的时候，要吉祥卧，右胁著席，好像弓一样的姿势。

sentences.english: When you lie down, use the auspicious posture, lying on your right side with your body curved in the shape of a bow.
sentences.chinese: 卧的时候，要吉祥卧，右胁著席，好像弓一样的姿势。

sentences.english: Where do you make it lie down at noon?
sentences.chinese: 晌午在何处使羊群歇卧？

sentences.english: Second lie the area is larger, advance 1 meter upcountry .
sentences.chinese: 次卧面积较大，向内推进1米。

sentences.english: Why not spend the end of lying drunk.
He makes a resting-place for me in the green fields: he is my guide by the quiet waters.
sentences.chinese: 他使我卧在青绿的草场，又领我走进幽静的水旁。

sentences.english: The cat is lying in the washing basket.

definition: to curl up/to lie curled up
pillow/to pillow/to rest one's head on (Taiwan pr. [zhen4] for this sense)
to rest for a bit/to take a breather
